title: Tupperware Stock Tumbles After Guidance Withdrawn
sub_head: Company pulls outlook amid higher costs and other problems, says turnaround will take longer than expected
body:
Tupperware Brands Corp. shares fell more than 30% after the company pulled its full-year guidance and said fixing operations would take longer than expected.
The company withdrew its outlook on a host of factors, including surging costs and disruptions from the war in Ukraine and Covid-19 lockdowns in China, as well as internal missteps related to executing its business, technology and service.
